item.title: Tales of War and Wit
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description:
Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of International Affairs and Conflicts

In Ukraine where the war’s drum did beat,
Foreign souls chose not to retreat.
In lands far and near,
Some sheriffs to fear,
While critics of armies might meet.

These are the headlines that were used to create this post:

  • Foreigners Who Made Ukraine Home Stay Put, Despite War
  • Russia once again took control of land that Ukraine had won back during its counteroffensive.
  • Who Investigates the Sheriff? In Mississippi, Often No One.
  • Criticize This African Countryâ€™s Army and You Might Be Drafted
